SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw.menu

Class SettingsMenu

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.menu.Menu
ie.atu.sw.menu.SettingsMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
WordReplacerSettingsMenu
public abstract class SettingsMenu extends Menu
Abstract class representing a settings menu in an application. This class extends Menu and is designed for managing user preferences and settings. It provides methods for displaying and resetting preferences.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new SettingsMenu with the given title, input reader, menu printer, and preferences.

  • Constructor Details

    • SettingsMenu

      public SettingsMenu(String title, InputReaderInterface inputReader, MenuPrinterInterface menuPrinter, Preferences preferences)
      Constructs a new SettingsMenu with the given title, input reader, menu printer, and preferences.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the settings menu
      inputReader - an InputReaderInterface used to read user input
      menuPrinter - an MenuPrinterInterface used to print the menu and options
      preferences - the Preferences object that stores the user preferences

  • Method Details

    • getPreferences

      protected Preferences getPreferences()
      Returns the Preferences object associated with this settings menu.
      Returns:
      the Preferences instance that holds the user preferences

    • printPreferences

      public abstract void printPreferences()
      Prints the current user preferences to the console. This method should be implemented by subclasses to display the specific preferences.

    • resetPreferences

      public abstract void resetPreferences()
      Resets the user preferences to their default values. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define how preferences are reset.
